Articles.Content:
Is there a mod that has low profile engines that work in 1.0.4?

I'm working on converting an Apollo-alike craft from .90 to 1.0.4, and due to changes with KAS being split into KAS and KIS, I've had to scrap the old lander design and go with a new one because the new KAS boxes aren't as low profile as the older ones, so I had to go with the inline 2m KIS container so I could fit my rover bits into the lander.

Why didn't just edit the old KAS boxes to be new boxes ?

EDIT- And you might check out Vanguard Astrodynamics VX Series - Stockalike Engine Pack http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/127803 looks like it has a couple.

Edited November 7, 2015 by Mecripp2

Why didn't just edit the old KAS boxes to be new boxes ?

EDIT- And you might check out Vanguard Astrodynamics VX Series - Stockalike Engine Pack http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/127803 looks like it has a couple.

I'll check that out, thank =)
